targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  avg(firstresponse) AS "firstresponse"
FROM case_details
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created) AND origin != 'Internal'

SELECT priority, COUNT(*) AS count
FROM case_details
WHERE created BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin != 'Internal'
GROUP BY priority
ORDER BY priority DESC;

SELECT
  created AS "time",
  CAST(casenumber as text) "Case Number",
  subject,
  tagPrimary as "Primary tag",
  tagSecondary as "Secondary tag"

FROM case_details
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created)
  AND (tagPrimary IS NULL OR tagSecondary is NULL)
ORDER BY "casenumber"

SELECT tagPrimary, tagSecondary, COUNT(*) AS "No Tags"
FROM case_details
WHERE created BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo() AND origin != 'Internal'
GROUP BY tagPrimary, tagSecondary
ORDER BY tagPrimary, tagSecondary DESC;

SELECT
  created AS "time",
  CAST(casenumber as text) "Case Number",
  subject,
  ROUND((firstresponse::numeric / responsesla::numeric) * 100, 2) || '%' AS "First Response / SLA %",
  ROUND((resolution::numeric / resolutionsla::numeric) * 100, 2) || '%'  AS "Resolution / SLA %"
FROM case_details
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created) AND
  ((firstresponse::numeric / responsesla::numeric) * 100 > 90 OR (resolution::numeric / resolutionsla::numeric) * 100 > 90) and origin != 'Internal'
ORDER BY "casenumber"

SELECT priority, avg(resolution) AS count
FROM case_details
WHERE created BETWEEN $__timeFrom() AND $__timeTo()  AND origin != 'Internal'
GROUP BY priority
ORDER BY priority DESC;

SELECT
  created AS "time",
  CAST(casenumber as text) "Case Number",
  priority AS "Priority",
  subject,
  tagPrimary as "Primary tags",
  tagSecondary as "Secondary tags",
  status,
  firstresponse * interval '1 sec' as "First response",
  CONCAT(
    (resolution / 86400)::integer, 'd ',
    ((resolution % 86400) / 3600)::integer, 'h ',
    ((resolution % 3600) / 60)::integer, 'm ',
    (resolution % 60), 's'
  ) as "Resolution time*"
FROM case_details
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created) AND
  status != 'Closed' AND
  origin != 'Internal'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  created AS "time",
  CAST(casenumber as text) "Case Number",
  priority AS "Priority",
  subject,
  tagPrimary as "Primary tags",
  tagSecondary as "Secondary tags",
  status
FROM case_details
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created) AND
  status != 'Closed' AND
  origin = 'Internal'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  CAST(casenumber as text) "Case Number",
  priority AS "Priority",
  subject,
  tagPrimary as "Primary tag",
  tagSecondary as "Secondary tag",
  status,
  CONCAT(
    (firstresponse / 86400)::integer, 'd ',
    ((firstresponse % 86400) / 3600)::integer, 'h ',
    ((firstresponse % 3600) / 60)::integer, 'm ',
    (firstresponse % 60), 's'
  ) as "First response",
  CASE WHEN responsesla is not null THEN CONCAT(
    (responsesla / 86400)::integer, 'd ',
    ((responsesla % 86400) / 3600)::integer, 'h ',
    ((responsesla % 3600) / 60)::integer, 'm ',
    (responsesla % 60), 's')
  END as "Response time SLA",
  CONCAT(
    (resolution / 86400)::integer, 'd ',
    ((resolution % 86400) / 3600)::integer, 'h ',
    ((resolution % 3600) / 60)::integer, 'm ',
    (resolution % 60), 's'
  ) as "Resolution time",
  CASE WHEN resolutionsla is not null THEN CONCAT(
    (resolutionsla / 86400)::integer, 'd ',
    ((resolutionsla % 86400) / 3600)::integer, 'h ',
    ((resolutionsla % 3600) / 60)::integer, 'm ',
    (resolutionsla % 60), 's')
  END as "Resolution time SLA",
  ROUND((firstresponse::numeric / responsesla::numeric) * 100, 2) || '%' AS "First Response / SLA %",
  ROUND((resolution::numeric / resolutionsla::numeric) * 100, 2) || '%'  AS "Resolution / SLA %",
  slaexcluded as "Excluded from SLA"
  
FROM case_details
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created) AND
  origin != 'Internal'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  CAST(casenumber as text) "Case Number",
  priority AS "Priority",
  subject,
  tagPrimary as "Primary tag",
  tagSecondary as "Secondary tag",
  status  
FROM case_details
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created) AND
  origin = 'Internal'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  firstresponder, avg(firstresponse) * interval '1 sec' AS "First response"
FROM case_firstresponders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created) AND origin != 'Internal' AND accountid != '0013k00003MRvgCAAT'
group by firstresponder

SELECT
  casenumber, customername, firstresponder, firstresponse  * interval '1 sec' as "First response"
FROM case_firstresponders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created) AND origin != 'Internal' AND accountid != '0013k00003MRvgCAAT'

SELECT
  casenumber, firstresponder, firstresponse  * interval '1 sec' as "First response"
FROM case_firstresponders
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(created) AND origin != 'Internal' AND accountid != '0013k00003MRvgCAAT' and firstresponse > 1799
